structures

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    A Level is the generic structure for each level's storage information.
    Author:
    Sean Lewis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level()
      Creates a new Level with blank values.
      Level(Ball ball, java.util.ArrayList<Body> bodies, java.util.ArrayList<WarpPoint> warps, java.util.ArrayList<GoalPost> goals, java.util.ArrayList<Blockage> blockages, double followfactor, double gravityStrength)
      Creates a new level
